bibl.title: Modern Urbanization as a Major Obstruction to Salvage and Conservation of Sites and Monuments in Egypt.
bibl.note: Concerne notamment Crocodilopolis et Bubastis. - Non vidimus.
Esmael F.A., Modern Urbanization as a Major Obstruction to Salvage and Conservation of Sites and Monuments in Egypt.
Journ. Fac. of Archaeol. 3 (1989) pp. 187-211, 2 figg. et 11 pll.
